title: Image Delineation Technology Understanding and Application Project

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners analyze images including actual rainfall effects in teams and apply deraining techniques through an iterative improvement process. Practical work is conducted using personal devices (BYOD), with formative assessments via interim feedback

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic principles and technical limitations of image deraining.
Learners understand the concept of the hierarchical feature refinement module (AFR) and can apply it to image quality enhancement processes.
Through team collaboration, learners can analyze images with different rainfall patterns and establish step-by-step improvement strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
